Tip of the Day
The base chance to find most Chests is 1/250, which you can increase with better gear and tools.

Chicken

Normal PetRare Pet

Chicken
(Adult)
Animated:

A lively chicken, known for their exceptional eggs and foraging abilities.

Chicken is a pet. It hatches from a Chicken egg.

Requirement To Gain Experience

  • While doing Foraging.

Names

These are the default names this pet can have when it first hatches:

  • Ace
  • Camilla
  • Chuck
  • Clucky
  • Gertrude
  • Ginger
  • Hennessy
  • Kin
  • Rocky
  • Sheik

Lovestruck Chicken
(Adult)
Animated:

This chicken absolutely loves you! It can't help but show it even on the outside.

Lovestruck Chicken is a rare pet. It hatches from a rare Chicken egg.

Requirement To Gain Experience

  • While doing Foraging.

Names

These are the default names this pet can have when it first hatches:

  • Ace
  • Camilla
  • Chuck
  • Clucky
  • Gertrude
  • Ginger
  • Hennessy
  • Kin
  • Rocky
  • Sheik

Egg

Chicken
(Egg)
Animated:

This pet is an Egg from level 0 to level 1.

Experience To Hatch

  • Requires an additional 35,000 experience to advance to level 1. (35,000 total experience required)
    • This pet will become a Juvenile when it reaches level 1.

Juvenile

NormalLightDarkRare

Chicken
(Juvenile)
Animated:

Chicken
(Juvenile)
Animated:

Chicken
(Juvenile)
Animated:

Lovestruck Chicken
(Juvenile)
Animated:

This pet is a Juvenile from level 1 to 4.

Experience To Grow

  • Requires an additional 50,000 experience to advance to level 2. (85,000 total experience required)
  • Requires an additional 65,000 experience to advance to level 3. (150,000 total experience required)
  • Requires an additional 100,000 experience to advance to level 4. (250,000 total experience required)
    • This pet will become an Adult when it reaches level 4.

Attributes

Level Attributes
1 +2% Work efficiency While doing Foraging.
2 +4% Work efficiency While doing Foraging.
+5% Fine material finding While doing Foraging.
+1% Bonus experience While doing Foraging.
3 +6% Work efficiency While doing Foraging.
+10% Fine material finding While doing Foraging.
+2% Bonus experience While doing Foraging.

Adult

NormalLightDarkRare

Chicken
(Adult)
Animated:

Chicken
(Adult)
Animated:

Chicken
(Adult)
Animated:

Lovestruck Chicken
(Adult)
Animated:

This pet is an Adult at level 4.

Ability

This ability is unlocked at level 4.

   Pecking Order
Effect Requirement Cooldowns Charges
Completes 5 Foraging actions instantly. While doing Foraging. 4,000 steps
While doing Foraging.		 5
With blinding speed, you watch as your Chicken goes foraging in the area for you, bringing back some of the spoils.

Attributes

Level Attributes
4 +7% Work efficiency While doing Foraging.
+15% Fine material finding While doing Foraging.
+3% Bonus experience While doing Foraging.
-1 Steps required While doing Foraging.
